channel.title: If You Would Be So Kind, Can Someone Host A Server For Me!
channel.description: Hi Everyone... My computer's IPconfig and stuff is all screwed up because of stupid Hamachi, :mad: (Hoping to get a laptop soon...) I was wondering if someone would host a server for me. (I will supply source) I'll edit the map, and give you code that's already set, and all you have to do is install it in. I will be doing all the design work and you would be running the server. I would make you staff on the server. Also I am looking for someone to make a client with my background image, everytime I try to do it on my own It never works! :mad: :mad: :mad: Thanks everyone! :D (PS: [u][i][b]Please DON'T FLAME! I DON'T CARE ABOUT YOUR MEAN COMMENTS![/b][/i][/u])

item.title: If You Would Be So Kind, Can Someone Host A Server For Me!

if i were to host your server, which im not btw,

[quote=“josdog, post:1, topic:335732”]I would make you staff on the server.[/quote] actually, i would make you staff.

Read full topic

item.title: If You Would Be So Kind, Can Someone Host A Server For Me!
item.dc:creator: @josdog josdog
item.description:
@josdog wrote:

Hi Everyone… My computer’s IPconfig and stuff is all screwed up because of stupid Hamachi, :mad: (Hoping to get a laptop soon…) I was wondering if someone would host a server for me. (I will supply source) I’ll edit the map, and give you code that’s already set, and all you have to do is install it in. I will be doing all the design work and you would be running the server. I would make you staff on the server. Also I am looking for someone to make a client with my background image, everytime I try to do it on my own It never works! :mad: :mad: :mad: Thanks everyone!
(PS: Please DON’T FLAME! I DON’T CARE ABOUT YOUR MEAN COMMENTS!)

Read full topic
